typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT  [ProductID]\n      ,[Name]\n      ,[Color]\n      ,[StandardCost]\n      ,[ListPrice]\n      ,[Size]\n      ,[Weight]\n      ,[ProductCategoryID]  \n FROM [SalesLT].[Product]',
	format: 'query') ~> SORPROD
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SORPRODCAT
SORPROD, SORPRODCAT join(SORPROD@ProductCategoryID == SORPRODCAT@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CatName = SORPRODCAT@Name,
		ProdName = SORPROD@Name,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DFTOutput.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
